comments.body: Does this declaration file itself actually depend on `jasmine`? Do you want consumers of this library to also get all the members of `jasmine` in their global namespace? Or do you just want to be able to use it in the tests?

It is my understanding that frisby.js is dependent on jasmine.
I believe I want consumers of this library to also get members of jasmine.
Also, yes my test file relies on jasmine.

Example code from frisby.js: https://github.com/vlucas/frisby/blob/master/src/frisby/spec.js#L330
